original: @101a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @101a # // rgya gar skad du /

original: shr'i da sha kro dha bi dya bi dhi n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i da sha kro dha bi dya bi dhi n'a ma /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: dpal khro bo bcu'i rig pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal khro bo bcu'i rig pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba /
translated: The Ritual of the Knowledge of the Ten Glorious Wrathful Ones

original: dpal khro bo bcu la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal khro bo bcu la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the ten glorious wrathful ones.

original: gro ga'am lo ma la rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo bri'o //
analyzed: gro ga'am lo ma la rtsibs brgyad pa'i 'khor lo bri'o //
translated: Draw an eight-spoked wheel on birch bark or a leaf.🔽In the east:

original: shar du / nam: sa manta bu ddhe bhyo //
analyzed: shar du / nam: sa manta bu ddhe bhyo //

original: na mo mung+ga ra ha st'a ya tsandan mandal'a kshe pa k'a ra ya dh'ar ka s+ya raksha sh'ntim pushta kum ru h'um phat /
analyzed: na mo mung+ga ra ha st'a ya tsandan mandal'a kshe pa k'a ra ya dh'ar ka s+ya raksha sh'ntim pushta kum ru h'um phat /
translated: Namo muṃghara hasatāya candana maṇḍalakṣepakarāya dhāraka syarakṣa śāntiṃ puṣṭa kuru hūṃ phaṭ.🔽In the south:

original: ltor / na ma: sa manta buddhe bhyo ma h'a danda dha ra bi bi dha su r'a su ra mrda na bh'u t'a na ni rma tha rh'a ra ka s+ya raksham sh'intam pushtim ku ru h'um phat /
analyzed: ltor / na ma: sa manta buddhe bhyo ma h'a danda dha ra bi bi dha su r'a su ra mrda na bh'u t'a na ni rma tha rh'a ra ka s+ya raksham sh'intam pushtim ku ru h'um phat /
translated: Namaḥ samantabuddhānāṃ bhyo mahādaṇḍadhāri vibhīṣaṇa sura sura mardanabhūtānani rma tharara dhāraka syarakṣa śāntiṃ kuru hūṃ phaṭ.🔽In the west:

original: nub tu / nam: sa mnta buddhe bhyo hu lu hu lu ma h'a padma aa mri t'i ku ru bish'a ni dha'a ra ka s+ya raksham sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um phat /
analyzed: nub tu / nam: sa mnta buddhe bhyo hu lu hu lu ma h'a padma aa mri t'i ku ru bish'a ni dha'a ra ka s+ya raksham sh'antim pushtim ku ru h'um phat /
translated: Namaḥ samantabuddhānāṃ bhyo hulu hulu mahāpadma amṛta īkāru viṣa dhāraka syarakṣa śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ kuru hūṃ phaṭ.

original: byang du / na ma: samanta buddhe bhyo na mo badzra krodh'a ya ma h'a dam shto tka ta ghee ra b'a ya badzra sandoha da rb'a ya aamrita kundali dh'a ra ke s+ya raksham sh'a ntim pushtim ku ru h'um phat /
analyzed: byang du / na ma: samanta buddhe bhyo na mo badzra krodh'a ya ma h'a dam shto tka ta ghee ra b'a ya badzra sandoha da rb'a ya aamrita kundali dh'a ra ke s+ya raksham sh'a ntim pushtim ku ru h'um phat /
translated: Namo samanta buddhebhyo namo vajra krodhaya maha damstra utkarsa ghora vajra sandha darava amrita kundali dharake syaraksham shantim pushtim kuru hum phat.

original: dbang ldan du /🔽na ma: sa manta duddhe bhyo aom ya ma dand'a ya /🔽tu ru tu ru mu ru sarba dushtam /
analyzed: dbang ldan du / na ma: sa manta duddhe bhyo aom ya ma dand'a ya / tu ru tu ru mu ru sarba dushtam /

original: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya dh'a ra ka s+ya raksham sh'ntim pushtim ku ru h'um phat /
analyzed: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya dh'a ra ka s+ya raksham sh'ntim pushtim ku ru h'um phat /
translated: Namo samanta duddhebhyo om yama dandaya turu turu muru sarva dushtanam maraya maraya dharake syaraksham shantim pushtim kuru hum phat.🔽In the southeast:

original: me ru / na ma: sa manta buddhe bhyo na mo ma h'a ba l'a ya au tstshusham kro dha r'a dz'a ya sarba n'a g'a n'a hri da yam t'a da ya dh'a ra ke s+ya raksham sh'ntim pushtim ku ru h'unm phat /
analyzed: me ru / na ma: sa manta buddhe bhyo na mo ma h'a ba l'a ya au tstshusham kro dha r'a dz'a ya sarba n'a g'a n'a hri da yam t'a da ya dh'a ra ke s+ya raksham sh'ntim pushtim ku ru h'unm phat /
translated: Namo samanta buddhebhyo namo maha valaya uchushma krodha raja sarva naganan hridaya tamdaya dharake syaraksham shantim pushtim kuru hum phat.

original: bden bral du /🔽na ma: sa manta bu ddhe bhyo na ma aa tsa la k'a n'a ya /🔽tse tta tse t'a /🔽mo tta motta /
analyzed: bden bral du / na ma: sa manta bu ddhe bhyo na ma aa tsa la k'a n'a ya / tse tta tse t'a / mo tta motta /

original: tutta tutta / gha gha /
analyzed: tutta tutta / gha gha /
translated: Namo samanta buddhebhyo namo acala kanaya cetta cetta mota mota tutta tutta gha gha.

original: gh'a ta ya /
analyzed: gh'a ta ya /

original: gh'a @101b ta ya dh'a ra ka s+ya raksham sh'ntim pushtim ku ru h'um phat /
analyzed: gh'a @101b ta ya dh'a ra ka s+ya raksham sh'ntim pushtim ku ru h'um phat /
translated: Ghatadhara's protection, peace, and nourishment, hum phat.🔽In the wind direction:

original: rlung du / na ma: sa manta buddhe bhyo aom takki r'a dz'a dh'a ra ka s+ya raksham sh'ntim pushtim ku ru h'um dza:/
analyzed: rlung du / na ma: sa manta buddhe bhyo aom takki r'a dz'a dh'a ra ka s+ya raksham sh'ntim pushtim ku ru h'um dza:/
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas! Om! Takkirāja's protection, peace, and nourishment, hum jra.

original: 'khor lo'i lte bar /
analyzed: 'khor lo'i lte bar /
translated: In the center of the wheel:

original: aom sumbha ni su mabha h'um /
analyzed: aom sumbha ni su mabha h'um /

original: grihna gri hna h'um /🔽gri hn'a pa ya /
analyzed: grihna gri hna h'um / gri hn'a pa ya /

original: gri h'a pa ya h'um /
analyzed: gri h'a pa ya h'um /

original: a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'a na bidy'a r'a dza dh'a r'a ka s+ya raksham sh'antim pushtim h'um phat /
analyzed: a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'a na bidy'a r'a dza dh'a r'a ka s+ya raksham sh'antim pushtim h'um phat /
translated: Ānayaho! Bhagavān Vidyārāja's protection, peace, and nourishment, hum phat.

original: sv'a h'a / sngags 'dis 'khor lo yongs su 'khor bar bri'o //🔽na ma: samnta buddh'a n'am /
analyzed: sv'a h'a / sngags 'dis 'khor lo yongs su 'khor bar bri'o // na ma: samnta buddh'a n'am /
translated: Svaha. The wheel should be drawn with this mantra completely around.🔽Homage to all the Buddhas!

analyzed: na ma: samnta dha rm'a n'am /

analyzed: dpal khro bo bcu'i rig pa'i cho ga zhe bya ba rdzogs so /

analyzed: // / pandi ta dzee rta ris mdzad pa'o /
translated: It was composed by the paṇḍita Jetāri.

original: // / sgra pa chen po dzee ta karnnali zhal snga nas sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos /
analyzed: // / sgra pa chen po dzee ta karnnali zhal snga nas sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos /
